attributes.action: stop the proposed legislation requiring Facebook to monitor users' contacts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British Government has already proven on several occasions that it cannot be trusted with sensitive data.

We, the undersigned, feel that it would be irresponsible of the Government to start obtaining any further personal data until it has proven that it can be trusted

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the proposed legislation requiring Facebook to monitor users' contacts."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20225


Prime Minister's Office
